verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> again unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against<WH413> the Ammonites,<WH1121> <WH5983> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> them;

And say<WH559> unto the Ammonites,<WH1121> <WH5983> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> thou saidst,<WH559> Aha,<WH1889> against<WH413> my sanctuary,<WH4720> when<WH3588> it was profaned;<WH2490> and against<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> when<WH3588> it was desolate;<WH8074> and against<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> when<WH3588> they went<WH1980> into captivity;<WH1473>

Behold, <WH2009> therefore<WH3651> I will deliver<WH5414> thee to the men<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> for a possession,<WH4181> and they shall set<WH3427> their palaces<WH2918> in thee, and make<WH5414> their dwellings<WH4908> in thee: they<WH1992> shall eat<WH398> thy fruit,<WH6529> and they<WH1992> shall drink<WH8354> thy milk.<WH2461>

And I will make<WH5414> <WH853> Rabbah<WH7237> a stable<WH5116> for camels,<WH1581> and the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983> a couching place<WH4769> for flocks:<WH6629> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> thou hast clapped<WH4222> thine hands,<WH3027> and stamped<WH7554> with the feet,<WH7272> and rejoiced<WH8055> in heart<WH5315> with all<WH3605> thy despite<WH7589> against<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478>

Behold, <WH2009> therefore<WH3651> I will stretch out<WH5186> <WH853> mine hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> thee, and will deliver<WH5414> thee for a spoil<WH957> to the heathen;<WH1471> and I will cut thee off<WH3772> from<WH4480> the people,<WH5971> and I will cause thee to perish<WH6> out of<WH4480> the countries:<WH776> I will destroy<WH8045> thee; and thou shalt know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because that<WH3282> Moab<WH4124> and Seir<WH8165> do say,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> is like unto all<WH3605> the heathen;<WH1471>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I will open<WH6605> <WH853> the side<WH3802> of Moab<WH4124> from the cities,<WH4480> <WH5892> from his cities<WH4480> <WH5892> which are on his frontiers,<WH4480> <WH7097> the glory<WH6643> of the country,<WH776> Beth-jeshimoth,<WH1020> Baal-meon,<WH1186> and Kiriathaim,<WH7156>

Unto the men<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> with<WH5921> the Ammonites,<WH1121> <WH5983> and will give<WH5414> them in possession,<WH4181> that<WH4616> the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983> may not<WH3808> be remembered<WH2142> among the nations.<WH1471>
And I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon Moab;<WH4124> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because that<WH3282> Edom<WH123> hath dealt<WH6213> against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> by taking<WH5358> vengeance,<WH5359> and hath greatly offended,<WH816> <WH816> and revenged himself<WH5358> upon them;

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will also stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> Edom,<WH123> and will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from<WH4480> it; and I will make<WH5414> it desolate<WH2723> from Teman;<WH4480> <WH8487> and they of Dedan<WH1719> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword.<WH2719>

And I will lay<WH5414> <WH853> my vengeance<WH5360> upon Edom<WH123> by the hand<WH3027> of my people<WH5971> Israel:<WH3478> and they shall do<WH6213> in Edom<WH123> according to mine anger<WH639> and according to my fury;<WH2534> and they shall know<WH3045> <WH853> my vengeance,<WH5360> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> the Philistines<WH6430> have dealt<WH6213> by revenge,<WH5360> and have taken<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359> with a despiteful<WH7589> heart,<WH5315> to destroy<WH4889> it for the old<WH5769> hatred;<WH342>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> I will stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> the Philistines,<WH6430> and I will cut off<WH3772> <WH853> the Cherethims,<WH3774> and destroy<WH6> <WH853> the remnant<WH7611> of the sea<WH3220> coast.<WH2348>

And I will execute<WH6213> great<WH1419> vengeance<WH5360> upon them with furious<WH2534> rebukes;<WH8433> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD,<WH3068> when I shall lay<WH5414> <WH853> my vengeance<WH5360> upon them.
